name: App Store Connect Notifier
description: Get those App Store Connect notifications delivered directly to Slack.

BUNDLE_IDENTIFIER.description: The bundle identifier of the app you want these scripts to monitor the status.

BOT_API_TOKEN.description: The API token for your bot, provided by Slack.

BOT_SLACK_WEBHOOK_URL.description: The webhook url provided by Slack.

ITC_TEAM_IDS.description: Optional: If you're in multiple teams, enter the IDs of your App Store Connect team here (comma separated).

SLACK_CHANNEL_NAME.description: Specify the channel you'd like the bot to post App Store Connect status updates. Don't forget to add the bot to this channel in Slack so it can post there.

BOT_STATUS_SLACK_CHANNEL_NAME.description: Optional: Specify the channel you'd like the bot to post its uptime updates. Don't forget to add the bot to this channel in Slack so it can post there. If not provided, it won't post status updates.

POLL_TIME_IN_SECONDS.description: How often the script should check for updates (in seconds).
